unveil.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to show or tell people about a new product or plan for the first time
unveil.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The club has unveiled plans to build a new stadium.
unveil.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to remove the cover from something, especially as part of a formal ceremony
unveil.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The statue was unveiled by the Queen.
unveil.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to inform people about something, especially financial results or a new product
unveil.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Yesterday the bank unveiled a soaring 28 percent rise in profits for the year to December.
They have unveiled a new series of multimedia products, including a double CD-Rom with an interactive game.
